name: Alyssa Farah Griffin
role: White House Director of Strategic Communications
summary: Former White House communications director and co-host of The View who called Trump 'erratic' and 'delusional' and endorsed Kamala Harris.

keyStatements.quote: I don't think he is fit for the job. I think that he is erratic. I think that he can be delusional. I think that he is a narcissist and cares about himself first and foremost. And I do not want him to be our president again.
I am terrified of Trump running in 2024.

timeline.event: Became Press Secretary to Vice President Pence
Became White House Director of Strategic Communications
